text: The 2006–07 Austrian Cup was the 73rd season of the nationwide cup competition in Austrian football. FK Austria Wien were the defending champions. == First round == ==Second round== ==Round of 16== ==Quarter finals== ==Semi-finals== ==Final== {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" GK 1 Szabolcs Sáfár RB 31 Joachim Standfest CB 3 Fernando Troyansky CB 5 Mario Tokić LB 16 Ronald Gërçaliu MF 8 Arkadiusz Radomski MF 15 Jocelyn Blanchard MF 30 Milenko Ačimovič MF 14 Andreas Lasnik CF 11 Hannes Aigner CF 4 David Lafata Substitutes: Substitutes: Substitutes: RB 22 Johannes Ertl CF 19 Václav Svěrkoš CF 17 Thomas Pichlmann Manager: Manager: Manager: Georg Zellhofer Georg Zellhofer Georg Zellhofer Georg Zellhofer ==Top goalscorers== Rank Player Club Goals 1 David Witteveen FC Red Bull Salzburg Amateure 6 2 10 players 3 transfermarkt.at Torschützen (German) ==References== Category:Austrian Cup Category:2007 in Europe Category:2007 in association football Category:2000s in Austria
